data.text:
@DonaKempton @southpacificpix @FernSutherland @nzwine I have been to NZ and can confirm it’s gorgeous. 
My fantasy about being in my fav shows also runs to getting jokes in there to see if they’re noticed. My one for Brokenwood would be a sign reading ‘Twinned with Midsommer’ somewhere in the background.

@JasperDiamond6 @southpacificpix @FernSutherland @nzwine Love it, this is exactly what I want to do now ... With a base in New Zealand of course. Despite all the murders in Brokenwood 😉 it does seem a lovely place to live, the wine would be cheaper and no fear of it running out (I'm guessing)

@DonaKempton @southpacificpix @FernSutherland @nzwine You know when people say “when I win the lottery…” Well, I’m going to travel the world and get extra work on all my favourite shows, just as ‘man drinking beer’ in the background of a scene. 😂😂😂

@JasperDiamond6 @southpacificpix @FernSutherland Thank you. I shall see if I can get that channel, I honestly hadn't realised....Though I do like my idea of moving to New Zealand, drinking @nzwine and being on the cast or crew. I could be that bloated body they pull out the river (with a crane)..no costume needed😁😁or security
@southpacificpix @FernSutherland Can’t wait. Will be Autumn again before we will get it in the UK. I’m sure it will be worth the wait. 👍

@DonaKempton @southpacificpix @FernSutherland Season 7 has been shown in the UK. And great it was, as usual. 
It was broadcast on UKTV’s Drama channel, it may be still available on their streaming platform. I think it’s called UKTV PLAY. Enjoy.

@southpacificpix @FernSutherland Good grief series 7 hasn't been shown in the UK yet......I need to move to New Zealand .......... And get a part in the show..........and live a happy life with my favourite wine and people and stuff like that .....
